text: avaṉtāṉ uṅkaḷai maṇṇiliruntu paṭaittāṉ; piṉ intiriyattiliruntum piṉ alak eṉṉum nilaiyiliruntum (uruvākki) uṅkaḷaik kuḻantaiyāka veḷiyākkukiṟāṉ; piṉ nīṅkaḷ uṅkaḷ vālipattai aṭaintu, piṉṉar mutiyōrākukiṟīrkaḷ; itaṟku muṉṉar iṟantu viṭuvōrum uṅkaḷil irukkiṉṟaṉar - iṉṉum nīṅkaḷ oru kuṟippiṭṭa tavaṇaiyai aṭaivīrkaḷ; (itiliruntu) nīṅkaḷ uṇarvu peṟum poruṭṭu (itai aṟintu koḷḷuṅkaḷ)
